sentence.Network_en: The prow of the motor - boat cut through the water like a knife.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽艇的船头像一把刀子劈开水面向前行驶.

sentence.Network_en: The part of a ship at which the prow joins the keel.
sentence.Network_cn: '前'.''踵艏''. '柱'.''脚船的一部分,船首与船骨相接于此.

sentence.Network_en: And there were wishes here, but never prow and stern.
sentence.Network_cn: 既载人,也载梦想, 但范围出不了船头船尾.

...”到“激情燃烧”的“玉露”之间有巨大的跳跃，但跳跃得自如疏放。“白皙的手”（lily hand）、“闪烁的船头”（glimmering prow）与“银色沙粒”（silver sand）之间在视觉意象上也有很大差距，然而，三个描绘光的同一个特点的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French proue, from Provençal proa, probably via Latin from Greek prōira, from a base represented by Latin pro 'in front'

entry.def: The prow of a ship or boat is the front part of it.

means.word_mean: 1. front part of a vessel or aircraft;

sentences.sentence: "he pointed the bow of the boat toward the finish line"
